"Calendar is a system app. It allows you to check the date and manage events. You'll still be able to use Calendar via the Home screen widget or App vault after you remove the Home screen shortcut."
"Calendar is a system app. It allows you to create events and manage them. You'll still be able to use some Calendar features after you remove the Home screen shortcut."
"Calendar is a system app. You won't be able to manage events and use calendar widgets after you uninstall it."

string.name: user_notice_message
string.Data: You must agree to our User Agreement and Privacy Policy before using Calendar. In order to provide accurate data on local public holidays, birthdays, credit card repayments, and planned trips, Calendar needs to access your location, contacts, and messages, as well as connect to the internet. Agree?

resources.string: This info will be displayed when you have no events
Have a productive day at work!
